text: Using feminine wilesto get what you want?
title: Batman & Robin

text: Read a book. That passive-aggressivenumber went out long ago.
title: Batman & Robin

text: You give women a bad name.
title: Batman & Robin

text: As I told Lady Fries,when I pulled her plug...
title: Batman & Robin

text: Freeze is going to ice the city.
title: Batman & Robin

text: That's not P.C.What about Batperson or Batwoman?
title: Batman & Robin

text: Bruce, it's me, Barbara.I found the batcave.
title: Batman & Robin

text: -She knows who we are.-We must kill her.
title: Batman & Robin

text: Later. We have work to do.
title: Batman & Robin

text: We have 11 minutesto thaw the city.
title: Batman & Robin

text: I hope you've got10 million more of those toys.
title: Batman & Robin

text: It'll take the satellitesa minute to realign, but....
title: Batman & Robin

text: Telescope's gone.There's no way to thaw the city.
title: Batman & Robin

text: The satellites could do it,but it'd take a computer genius.
title: Batman & Robin

text: Have to do it upside down.
title: Batman & Robin

text: You're pretty good at this, little girl.
title: Batman & Robin

text: Looks like it's gonna be a beautiful day.
title: Batman & Robin

text: I'm taking you backto Arkham Asylum.
title: Batman & Robin

text: Just as you killed my wife.
title: Batman & Robin

text: As I told Lady Frieswhen I pulled her plug...
title: Batman & Robin

text: ...waiting for you to find a cure.
title: Batman & Robin

text: But vengeance isn't power.Anyone can take a life.
title: Batman & Robin

text: ...that's true power.A power you once had.
title: Batman & Robin

text: Show me how to cureMacgregor's Syndrome, stage one.
title: Batman & Robin

text: And maybe you can also save the lifeof the man your wife once loved.
title: Batman & Robin

text: I'll have your wifemoved to the lab at Arkham.
title: Batman & Robin

text: You'll be able to continueyour research there.
title: Batman & Robin

text: All we can do now is wait...
title: Batman & Robin

text: And I've cometo make your life a living hell.
title: Batman & Robin

text: Rather disappointed at how poorlyI have taught you proper housekeeping.
title: Batman & Robin

text: When we fell off the telescope,why didn't you try and save us?
title: Batman & Robin

text: It's the first time I felland you weren't there.
title: Batman & Robin

text: I figured you could handle it.
title: Batman & Robin

text: You know, sometimes counting onsomebody else is the only way to win.
title: Batman & Robin

text: Excuse me. I'm the onewho kicked Ivy's botanical butt.
title: Batman & Robin

text: I did it all by myself. That was me.
title: Batman & Robin

text: You are going back to school.
title: Batman & Robin

text: We're going to need a bigger cave.
title: Batman & Robin
